title: Authentication | Creatio Academy
content: This is documentation for Creatio 8.1 . For up-to-date documentation, see the latest version ( 8.3 ). Version: 8.1 Authentication basics OAuth 2.0 Integrate the cell connection provider (2FA via SMS)
markdown:

For up-to-date documentation, see the **[latest version](/docs/8.x/dev/development-on-creatio-platform/category/authentication)** (8.3).
